name: Hokutobu
description:
The land is under the clutches of the cubes of darkness. But one shrine maiden, equpped with the force of chaos, is about to destroy the order of darkness

... to replace it with her own reign of total chaos.




Follow Meimu the Princes of Chaos through a giant garden. Free it from the bakemono

Find the cubes of Saturn.

Destroy them and Conquer the Land for the sake of ultimate chaos.

Keyboard and Joystick Support

Created by
Digital Phoenix UG (Haftungsbeschränkt)

Team Lead: Manuel Peters

Programming, Sound, Grafics: Michael Kumpmann


Unofficial fanproject inspired by Touhou. Not affiliated or endorsed by Zun or Team Shanghai alice.
